uid.description: Unique identifier for the phone number record.

business_uid.description: Unique identifier of the business that owns this phone number.

phone_number.description: The complete phone number in E.164 format without formatting (e.g., "12127654321"). This is the actual phone number that was purchased from the telecom provider.

country_code.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code indicating the country where the phone number is registered (e.g., "US" for United States, "CA" for Canada).

area_code.description: The area code portion of the phone number. For North American numbers, this is typically a 3-digit code that identifies the geographic region (e.g., 302 for Delaware).

features.description: List of telephony features to enable for this phone number, (e.g., ["VOICE", "SMS"]).

status.description: Current operational status of the phone number.

created_at.description: The creation date and time of the phone number record.

updated_at.description: Updated date and time of the phone number record.
